SEARCH

Class GameGUI

java.lang.Object
GameGUI
public class GameGUI extends Object
Represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for the game, which is visible to both players at all times. Displays each player's visible cards and the trump cards that have been played during the round. Displays the current "goal" (e.g., 21, 17, etc) and the current "bet" (e.g., 1, 2, etc). Displays the punishment at the end of each round, showing if the player has been eliminated or has survived with drawings and sound. This class also contains other helpful methods such as a wait method for other classes to use. This class also contains public symbolic constants such as the card images and dimensions of the screen for other classes to reference.

    • TRUMP_CARD_DESCRIPTIONS

      public static final HashMap<String,String[]> TRUMP_CARD_DESCRIPTIONS
      The descriptions for all trump cards. Keys are represented by the concatenation of a TrumpCard's getType and getValue methods' return values in that order. Values represent the title of the description (element 0) and the full description (element 1).

    • NUMBER_CARD_TILES

      public static final Tile[] NUMBER_CARD_TILES
      The image tiles for all number cards. To find the index for a NumberCard, take the value from the NumberCard's getValue method and subtract 1 from it. The last Tile of the array is the image tile for a hidden card.

    • TRUMP_CARD_TILES

      public static final Tile[] TRUMP_CARD_TILES
      The image tiles for all trump cards. Use getTrumpCardIndex to find the index of a TrumpCard.

    • NERF_GUN_TILE

      public static final Tile NERF_GUN_TILE
      The image tile for the nerf gun

    • PLAYER_TILES

      public static final Tile[] PLAYER_TILES
      The image tiles for the players. Indicies 0, 1, and 2 each represent a different character sprite which is currently alive. Indicies 3, 4, and 5 each represent the eliminated character sprite images for indicies 0, 1, and 2 respectively.

      Initializes a GameGUI object which uses the information from the given dealer.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the GUI. Initializes the game window and loads all image tiles and trump card descriptions.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the GUI. Closes the game window in a fashion similar to hitting the "x" manually.

    • writeTurnMessage

      public void writeTurnMessage()
      Writes the message telling the player that the turn is changing

    • clearTurnMessage

      public void clearTurnMessage()
      Clears the message telling the player that the turn is changing

    • getTrumpCardIndex

      public static int getTrumpCardIndex(TrumpCard trumpCard)
      Returns the index of the TrumpCard's image tile in TRUMP_CARD_TILES.
      Parameters:
      trumpCard - the trump card
      Returns:
      the index of the trump card's image tile in TRUMP_CARD_TILES

    • updateGameWindow

      public void updateGameWindow()
      Redraws the game window based on the most current information from this GameGUI's dealer.

    • wait

      Causes the program to wait for a number of seconds.
      Parameters:
      sec - the number of seconds
